author: Simon Difford
description: As the name suggests, this refreshing and fruity long drink is both gin-laced and pink in colour. And yes, it's also fizzy. Well if not out and out fizzy, it is at least invigorated with sparkling water. So perhaps that's why merely fizz rather than fizzy?
name: Pink Gin Fizz
